idea-plugin.name: Kotlin Anko Converter For Xml
idea-plugin.description:
Convert layout xml to kotlin code use anko.
Java 8 at least.
Select or open a layout xml under res/layout.
Open the Code Menu.
Chose the last option "Convert Layout Xml to Kotlin Anko".
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Support gravity start,end.
Support android theme.
Support layout_scrollFlags.
Support layout_behavior.
Support popupTheme.
Support ?attr/ and ?android:attr/

action.text: Convert Layout Xml to Kotlin Anko
